name: BIHANG WELFARE ASSOCIATION
briefDescription: Bihang Welfare Association is a national level non-profit organization registered under the Societies Registration Act Of 1860. It has been engaged with various sustainable social interventions supporting economically weaker sections (EWS) in Various parts of the country since 2008. The organization was started with a vision to create a just and equitable society for the poor and the vulnerable. Mainstreaming of such people and providing them a source of better living drove the organisationâ€™s work in the initial years. Bihang has been operating majorly in Odisha and parts of NCR.
